name: Clepto Frog
description:
The office’s pet frog Clepto steals mugs while everyone is away. Clepto obviously starts with no mugs. WITH NOTHING I TELL YOU. NOTHING.

How to play: 

TO AIM: WASD.
TO SHOOT: SPACEBAR.
TO SHIFT MOMENTUM: WASD.
TO RELEASE: SPACEBAR.

Ludam Dare Jam 45 Game. 

Theme: Start With Nothing.
